original_text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them: and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea.
korean_text: 그 근처에 사는 자가 다 두려워하고 이 모든 말이 온 유대 산골에 두루 퍼지매

sentences.original_text: and all these sayings were noised abroad
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 모든 말씀이 널리 퍼져 나갔다

sentences.original_text: throughout all the hill country of Judaea
